name: Push
description: Moves person or creature back one space. (Will not work if there is something under the person or monster)

name: Smackdown
description: Swing-based damage that also self-heals 10% - 20% of max Vita, depending on how low the caster's HP is

name: Iron Will
description: 20s curse immunity. Also removes all active curses

name: Savage Form
description: All Vita attacks act as though the caster is full health and caster cannot be taken below 1 Vita while active

name: Bloodbath
description: Adds 1% of current health to swing damage
